title: Movietone memories
creator_credit: Alec Morgan, Chris Oliver, Tru-Vu Pictures and Film World
brief_description: A unique time capsule of our country’s past as captured by the Movietone news crews from the early thirties though to the mid fifties. The headlines, our sporting achivements, the tragedies, and our nation’s often off-beat sense of humour.
creator_credit_for_label: Alec Morgan, Chris Oliver, Tru-Vu Pictures and Film World
